title: Did a Pizza Hut Manager Disparage U.S. Servicemembers?
subtitle: Pizza Hut confirmed that a man named 'Caleb Lee' fabricated a story about a rude store manager's decrying servicemen and first responders.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A man named Caleb Lee asked for a military discount and was berated by a Pizza Hut manager for his purported sense of entitlement.
